538    _a System requirements: Macintosh; 4MB RAM; System 6.0.7 or
 later; 256-color (thirteen-inch or larger) or 256-grayscale
 (twelve-inch or larger) monitor; QuickTime-compatible CD-ROM
 drive. Apple twelve-inch RGB color monitors support video, but
 not supplemental text.
500    _a Title from disc label.
520    _a Presents a full-length film in which the Beatles escape
 the harassment of their manager and Paul's grandfather by
 taking a train from Liverpool to London. Includes original
 script; profiles of the Beatles, cast, and crew; clips from the
 director's early work; and word search feature.
